page.content: Ticket info, game times announced for 2026 Classic Full venue ticket strips for the 2026 World Baseball Classic are available exclusively to season-ticket holders in Houston (Pool B) and Miami (Pool D). Full ticket strips for each venue, including San Juan (Pool A) and Tokyo (Pool C), will become available to the general public in the coming weeks and months. Learn more play-overlay-20 Colombia, Brazil, Chinese Taipei, Nicaragua complete '26 pools After outlasting the field at the 2025 Qualifiers, Colombia ( Pool A ), Brazil ( Pool B ), Chinese Taipei ( Pool C ) and Nicaragua ( Pool D ) will join the 16 other teams at the 2026 World Baseball Classic. The 2026 tournament will take place across four cities -- San Juan, Houston, Tokyo and Miami -- March 5-17, 2026. Venezuela If Team USA advances to the quarterfinals in Houston, they will play Friday, March 13, regardless if they're the Pool B winner or Pool B runner-up. If Team Japan advances to the quarterfinals in Miami, they will play Saturday, March 14, regardless if they're the Pool C winner or Pool C runner-up. Atlantic Standard Time (AST) = Local time in San Juan; Central Standard Time (CST) = Local time in Houston; Japan Standard Time (JST) = Local time in Tokyo; Eastern Standard Time (EST) = Local time in Miami Pool A Schedule Top two teams will advance to the quarterfinals March 6 Game 1 12:00 PM AST Cuba Panama March 6 Game 2 7:00 PM AST Puerto Rico Colombia March 7 Game 3 12:00 PM AST Colombia Canada March 7 Game 4 7:00 PM AST Panama Puerto Rico March 8 Game 5 12:00 PM AST Colombia Cuba March 8 Game 6 7:00 PM AST Panama Canada March 9 Game 7 12:00 PM AST Colombia Panama March 9 Game 8 7:00 PM AST Cuba Puerto Rico March 10 Game 9 7:00 PM AST Canada Puerto Rico March 11 Game 10 3:00 PM AST Canada Cuba Atlantic Standard Time (AST) = Local time Pool B Schedule Top two teams will advance to the quarterfinals March 6 Game 1 12:00 PM CST Mexico Great Britain March 6 Game 2 7:00 PM CST United States Brazil March 7 Game 3 12:00 PM CST Brazil Italy March 7 Game 4 7:00 PM CST Great Britain United States March 8 Game 5 12:00 PM CST Great Britain Italy March 8 Game 6 7:00 PM CST Brazil Mexico March 9 Game 7 12:00 PM CST Brazil Great Britain March 9 Game 8 7:00 PM CST Mexico United States March 10 Game 9 8:00 PM CST Italy United States March 11 Game 10 6:00 PM CST Italy Mexico Central Standard Time (CST) = Local time If Team USA advances to the quarterfinals in Houston, they will play Friday, March 13, regardless if they're the Pool B winner or Pool B runner-up.
